Uses of Class
primitives.Material

Packages that use Material 
Package Description
geometries  

  • Uses of Material in geometries

    Fields in geometries declared as Material 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Material Geometry._material
    the material of the object
    Methods in geometries that return Material 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Material Geometry.get_material()
    getter for Material of the geometry.
    Constructors in geometries with parameters of type Material 
    Constructor Description
    Cylinder​(Material material, Color emission, double radius, Ray ray)
    Cylinder constructor receiving the radius and the axis rays emission light and material.
    Geometry​(Material material, Color emission)
    constructor for Geometry that sets the emission light and material of the object.
    Plane​(Material material, Color emission, Point3D po1, Point3D po2, Point3D po3)
    Plane constructor receiving 3 points on the planes emission light and material.
    Plane​(Material material, Color emission, Point3D po, Vector normal)
    Plane constructor receiving a point on the plane and a vector perpendicular to the plane.
    Polygon​(Material material, Color emission, Point3D... vertices)
    Polygon constructor based on vertices list.
    RadialGeometry​(Material material, Color emission, double radius)
    RadialGeometry constructor receiving radius value.
    Sphere​(Material material, Color emission, double radius, Point3D po)
    Sphere constructor receiving Sphere radius value and the Sphere Center point and emission light.
    Triangle​(Material material, Color emission, Point3D po1, Point3D po2, Point3D po3)
    Triangle constructor receiving 3 points3D representing the Triangles vertices emission light and material.
    Tube​(Material material, Color emission, double radius, Ray ray, float height)
    Tube constructor receiving Tube radius value and the Tube height emission light and material.
